question: Rama Sengupta Paul, who passed away recently, was the veteran personality in which field?
explanation: Rama Sengupta Paul (66), the Veteran lady mountaineer, has passed away in Kolkata, West Bengal. She led the first successful all-women expedition to Kedarnath Dome in Garhwal Himalaya which was organized by  city-based  Himalayan Association to commemorate the International Year of Women in 1975.
